content:
Related to issue #7889 to Change org permissions to be dropdowns or radio buttons.
@Rishi Gupta
Is this design looks implement concept you mentioned in issue?
gif

This looks great! Some small notes, now that I see it live:

  • Let's make the options: "All admins, and users at least 3 days old", and "All admins, and users at least N days old".
  • The default for N should be 3
"users at least 3 days old" sounds funny ( :baby:), but I don't know a better phrase

yeah, very open to suggestions if anyone can think of anything better. The main constraint is that it should be short.

This is borderline too long imo, but could be preferable if the current wording sounds too confusing: "All admins, and users with accounts at least 3 days old".
"All admins, and users with accounts at least 3 days old." makes more sense.
